entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 then light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
